title: RecognizerMetadata
description: Metadata about the recognizer that applied a tag, including scoring and pattern information.

recognizerId.description: Unique identifier of the recognizer that applied this tag

score.description: Confidence score assigned by the recognizer (0.0 to 1.0)

target.description: What the recognizer analyzed to apply this tag

patterns.description: Details of patterns that matched during recognition

patternMatch.description: Information about a pattern that matched during recognition

name.description: Name of the pattern that matched

score.description: Confidence score for this specific pattern match
